thread.title: BRIEF-Assembly Biosciences Presents Positive Interim Data from Phase 1a and 1b Studies of ABI-H0731 in HBV Patients

title: BRIEF-Assembly Biosciences Presents Positive Interim Data from Phase 1a and 1b Studies of ABI-H0731 in HBV Patients

organizations.name: brief-assembly biosciences presents positive interim data

text:
April 12, 2018 / 7:35 AM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Assembly Biosciences Presents Positive Interim Data from Phase 1a and 1b Studies of ABI-H0731 in HBV Patients Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Assembly Biosciences Inc: 
* ASSEMBLY BIOSCIENCES PRESENTS POSITIVE INTERIM DATA FROM PHASE 1A AND 1B STUDIES OF ABI-H0731 IN HBV PATIENTS IN A LATE-BREAKER SESSION AT THE EASL CONFERENCE 
* SAYS GENERALLY SAFE AND WELL TOLERATED; PLANNING UNDERWAY FOR PHASE 2A STUDIES BEGINNING SUMMER 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
